name: Happy Halloween Ticings® Edible Appliques
description:
1.25" Halloween appliques for mini or standard cupcakes, brownie bites and more— a little buttercream or fudge frosting will enable you to apply these to  an entire dessert bar of halloween treats.

Minimum wholesale order is 6 sheets per style (288 images). See our assortment packages for the independent bakery.

Ticings are thin sheets of edible icing that simply peel & press onto your home baked or store bought cupcakes. they merge with your buttercream or other soft frosting for a quick, professional looking decoration. so simple, even a child can apply them!

Ticings are gluten free, ou kosher certified and fat free. requiring no refrigeration, 12 month shelf life when properly stored away from light and air. ships in sealed bag via u.s. mail, with complete how-to instructions. Ticings may be applied to all sorts of desserts and frosting bases or royal icing. As a food product, returns are not accepted.

All orders are printed on demand for optimal freshness.

name: Baby Animal Ticings® Edible Appliques
description:
Perfect for baby showers, birthday parties or just a lunchbox or after school treat, these four adorable baby animals are from Ticings artists series featuring  Colette Kids of San Francisco.

1.25" appliques fit mini or standard cupcakes, brownie bites and more— use your imagination and a little buttercream or fudge frosting. create an entire dessert bar of treats using color coordinated frostings.

Minimum wholesale order 6 sheets of each design contain 288 images  (or see our assortment sets) for wholesale pricing. See our other website, Ticings.com for retail pricing.

Ticings are thin sheets of edible icing that simply peel & press onto your home baked or store bought cupcakes. they merge with your buttercream or other soft frosting for a quick, professional looking decoration. so simple, even a child can apply them!

Gluten free, kosher certified and fat free, ticings require no refrigeration, and have a shelf life of 12 months when properly stored away from light and air. Ships in sealed bag via u.s. mail, with complete how-to instructions. As a food product, returns are not accepted.

name: Artisan Rose Sugar
description:
2 oz.  of our own hand-crafted Rose Sugar. made of french roses and organic cane sugar, it's perfect for adding a splash of color to cupcakes for weddings, showers, tea parties or just every day. with a delicate flavor and beautiful coloring, our Rose Sugar makes a lovely addition to sugar bowls for shower or wedding buffet tables for coffee and tea service, too. Ships via 1st class mail within the Continental U.S. Please inquire about wholesale.

net weight 2 oz, 18 month shelf life.

ingredients: organic cane sugar, crystallized rose flower fragments containing isugar, gum arabic, natural flower, natural food color (E120 cocheneal), natural aroma, vegetable oil

sorry but as a food product, returns are not accepted.
